title: Lowest Methane Emissions from Buildings
description: In 2019, Saint Kitts and Nevis reported a minimal methane emission of 0.0001 Mt CO2e from buildings, showcasing its commitment to low carbon emissions.

title: Minimal F-gases Emissions from Industry
description: The country recorded a mere 0.0001 Mt CO2e of F-gases emissions from industrial processes in 2023, indicating a low environmental footprint from industrial activities.

title: Limited Education Expenditure
description: In 2021, Saint Kitts and Nevis allocated $13,736,000 to education, reflecting one of the lower education expenditures globally.

title: Minimal Child Mortality Rates
description: The nation reported only one death each in the age groups 5-9 and 10-14 years in 2021 and 2023, respectively, highlighting its effective child healthcare system.
